1: Rescue me, O God! Lord, hurry to my aid!
2-3: They are after my life and delight in hurting me. Confuse them! Shame them! Stop them! Don't let them keep on mocking me!
4: But fill the followers of God with joy. Let those who love your salvation exclaim, “What a wonderful God he is!”
5: But I am in deep trouble. Rush to my aid, for only you can help and save me. O Lord, don't delay.
